system.requirements:
.Vet. Comrade, Deadeye Shot, 
Apt: Perception, Finesse
system.descriptionText: Character chooses target of Size (Hulking, 5) or larger within line of sight and makes +0 Perception Test. If Comrade is in Cohesion they give Character +X or Felling(X) to the character's next attack against chosen target. Where X is the Degrees of Success on Perception Test.
